an8.78:4.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi … pe …
an8.78:4.2: chahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:4.4: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:4.8: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.78:4.9: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.78:4.10: Imehi kho, āvuso, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:5.1: * Pañcahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.78:5.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;

an8.78:6.1: Catūhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
